content: Shop - https://r3born.ccPlease leave positive feedback after buying For support, message me on crisp, which can be found in bottom right corner of the shopTelegram channel for updates: https://t.me/r3bornaccounts

comments.author: TripleThread
comments.body: Store owner doesn't respond to my tickets or my emails, they don't want to replace the none-working account.
